title: Zoo Family. - Volume 2.
creator_credit: Chris Sheil, Howard Neil and Crawford Productions
brief_description: Zoo Family was filmed on location at the Melbourne Zoological Gardens and each adventure revolves around the zoo vet and his children, Susie and Nick who manage to get into all sorts of adventures. However it is the animals who are the real stars of the film.
